main event: A UFO sighting was observed in North Arlington, Virginia, on September 26, 1954, lasting approximately 10 minutes.
interesting points: The sighting involved 1 to 3 objects, described as round and pea-sized with a yellowish-white coloration., The observer was a housewife, and her sighting was confirmed by another individual named Mr. Mintz., The object disappeared near a cloud bank after a few seconds of visibility on three different occasions., Significant local jet aircraft activity was reported during the observation period, indicating the possibility that the sighting could be misidentified aircraft., The conclusion of the report suggested it was likely an aircraft due to the rapidly decreasing visibility and the presence of jets.
